import SearchFieldProgrammaticSet from './SearchFieldProgrammaticSet?dev-site-example';

# Search Field Programmatic Set

### Description

This example demonstrates [Search Field](/components/cerner-terra-core-docs/search-field/about) with search text set programmatically. This example uses the 'inputRefCallback' callback ref to pass into the search input component and sets the search text. 

<SearchFieldProgrammaticSet title='Search Field Programmatic Set' />
